alert.note: Alert for Elmore; Montgomery (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 06 at 3:16PM CDT until April 09 at 9:10PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama... Tallapoosa River At The Tallapoosa Water Plant affecting Elmore and Montgomery Counties. .Flooding is forecast on the Tallapoosa River Basin near the Tallapoosa Water Plant and a flood warning remains in effect. Another statement will be issued by Thursday morning, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tallapoosa River At The Tallapoosa Water Plant. * WHEN...Until late Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, Lower Wetumpka Road starts to flood. Extensive flooding of low lands occurs and livestock and farm equipment should be moved to higher ground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:15 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 22.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 27.7 feet Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
